content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/getmoto/moto.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python base image
FROM python:3.9-slim

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install the development dependencies
RUN pip install -e .[all,server]
RUN pip install -r requirements-dev.txt
RUN pip install -r requirements-tests.txt

# Run the test suite to verify the installation
RUN pytest
